projects.name: Madmonnaie
projects.description: A simple blogging site built for a real estate agent. Built with React, styled with Bulma and populated with Contentful.

projects.name: CB Inventory Server
projects.description: An in house CMS built for CoderBunker to be used by staff and vistors to request rentals, get info on items & rooms and report problems. Built with Express, Bootstrap, Google Sheets API & utilizing QR codes for real-world user-item interactions.

projects.name: Digital Dude
projects.description: A retro full-stack clone of the original Tamagotchi game from the 80"s. Create an account, add some pets & keep them alive as long as you can. Built with Node, Sequelize, jQuery, JWT & Materialize.

projects.name: Burger App
projects.description: A simple demo of a fullstack application, Eat-Da-Burger! is hosted in Heroku & utilizes a Node backend, using a RESTful API routed with Express that makes requests to a MySQL database & ultimately serves the user a view using Handlebars templates.

projects.name: Leaderboard
projects.description: A React-based leaderboard app, pulling data from freeCodeCamp's most recent forum users.

projects.name: Employee Directory
projects.description: A simple demo app of an employee directory, including the ability to filter & sort the available data. A user can view an entire employee directory at once, allowing quick access to their desired information. Built with React, this app demonstrates its core ideas: breaking the UI into components, managing component state, and responding to user events.

projects.name: Covid-19 Tracker
projects.description: Web app offering current State-by-State data related to the Covid-19 pandemic. Built with jQuery, styled with Bulma & utilizing HighCharts API for data visualization.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Simple weather app offering geolocation forecast on intial visit, search functionality, current & five-day forecasts. Built with jQuery, Material Design Lite & utilizing TomTom, OpenWeather & IP-Info APIs for data.

projects.name: Day Planner
projects.description: Plan your day past, present & future. Basic task scheduler offering create & delete functionality for each hour of any day the user chooses. Built with jQuery, Bootstrap and Moment.js.

projects.name: Password Generator
projects.description: Create a randomized & complex password easily. Takes multiple user inputs & efficietnly computes a password that is offered and ready to copy. Built with jQuery & Bootstrap.

projects.name: Markdown Previewer
projects.description: Checkout what you're writing in Markdown. This simple app allows the user to preview their Markdown document in realtime. Built with React.

projects.name: jQuery Calculator
projects.description: A basic JS powered & Bootstrap styled calculator. One of my first projects, be gentle.

projects.name: Pomodoro Timer
projects.description: A pomodoro (i.e. tomato) timer to nudge you into starting any kind of task. Includes time-set & pausing functionality. Built with jQuery & styled with Bootstrap.

projects.name: Repsonsive Portfolio
projects.description: Simple demo site displaying the use of responsive design. Built with Bootstrap & utilizing NASA"s APOD API.

projects.name: NASA Quiz
projects.description: An interactive NASA-themed multiple choice quiz. Built with jQuery, styled with Bootstrap & utilizing the JSONBin API.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Battle against the computer in this classic game. Built with jQuery & Bootstrap.
